item.description: If you missed our last meet-up, it was our best one yet. We had 8 people show up and we had a great time. As a group, we decided to make a few changes, first to change the meet-ups to Wednesday night (instead of Thursday) and also to move this meet-up to the East Bay Grill for the summer. It was a fun atmosphere, the food was great and it seems to be a location that everyone can find easily. As always, if you get there and you can't find the group all my cell 847-361-8851-I have it on the table, so I will answer your call. Stop by and bring a friend. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet Up Sign will be on the tables

group.name: South Shore Graphic Designers, Writers & Web Folks

item.name: East Bay Grill
